about_the_game:
Get ready to discover the cozy village of Mininghill and its fantastic mines.

RUN AND DISCOVER THE MINES WITH YOUR MINING CART


Use your cart to run throught the dangers of the various mines in the Mininghill Archipelago, find new paths and overcome obstacles!

ADD TO YOUR CAR ALL THE ITEMS NECESSARY FOR THE MISSIONS


In Mininghill it will be possible to go to the workshop to fix your cart and add items to it that will help you along the way, from headlights and handbrake to completely new bodywork!

IT DOESN'T JUST NEED SKILL IN THE CAR TO CHALLENGE THE RAILS


You will also be able to explore and collect ores in the mines on foot, using a slingshot that will have different bullet types and also equipment for collecting ores, shovel and dynamite, among others.

FOLLOW A CAPTIVATING STORY


In the end, it's all about a good story being told. In The Big Mining, you will follow a simple but sincere story about our journey and what really matters to us. Ready to meet Ayla and her Mininghill adventures?

name: The Big Mining
short_description: Welcome to Mininghill, a place full of life and challenges. Here, you'll meet Ayla, a tarlok who is about to start a journey to become a great miner while dealing with the pressure of being the daughter of the biggest miner in Mininghill.
